Player History
Drafted in 15th round, 240th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Injured on 7/12/2015 with a Knocked Out Teeth, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/8/2016 with a Broken Finger, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 7/25/2017 (Going to DET: CF Carlos Lopez. Going to STL: 1B George Stebbins, C Jason Burr, 3B Mark Wright)...
Had first career hit on 8/24/2018, off Esteban Herrero (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2019, off Mark Stoughton (ATL)...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Colorado on 3/2/2020 (Going to STL: 3B Michael Hume. Going to COL: C Jason Burr)...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2022, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2022, hitting .352 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 9/9/2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/15/2023 with a Concussion, out for one week...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/9/2024 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/20/2024: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $11,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
